## IPackageJsonExports.production property

This export matches in production-only environments. This is always mutually exclusive with [IPackageJsonExports.development](./node-core-library.ipackagejsonexports.development.md)<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
production?: string | IPackageJsonExports;
```
